message: As a newbie to anything past HTML I found this great deal on Learn Python the Hard Way - 68% off http://t.co/17JQzn9
250USD for a book ("normallyQ)? seems there's something fishy here, even because the download of it is free
Here's the class: http://www.udemy.com/learn-python-the-hard-way/ (linked from the bottom of http://learnpythonthehardway.org/ )
I think the $250 is for the online training... the book is available through http://learnpythonthehardway.org/ ($1/$16/$60 for PDF/paperback/hardcover)

oh, at first it seemed like a scam, then i went to http://learnpythonthehardway.org/ and see the prices. why dont you read/do the 1st chapters of the html  edition and see for yourself if it's worth it?
